product_name: Outdoor Research Ridgeline Insulated Gloves - Men's
long_description: Serious winter warriors: these gloves sport waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex inserts and water-resistant, high-loft synthetic insulation to shield you from the elements and harness hand heat.
short_description: Serious winter warriors: these gloves sport waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex inserts and water-resistant, high-loft synthetic insulation to shield you from the elements and harness hand heat.
